title: Problem I had with "Your Shop" (Sept 19th).

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
I'm not too sure why my "Your Shop" changed all my discounts that it showed when I clicked on the hidden banner, I Opened it yesterday (Sept 18th) and I got Dark Star {{champion:121}} , Blood moon {{champion:91}} , Super Galaxy {{champion:105}} , World Breaker {{champion:75}} , Project {{champion:236}} , and Pickpocket {{champion:29}} , (I'll try to get proof that i got these skins but I took a video on snapchat and didn't save it so I'm not sure if I can). Problem is that I logged on yesterday and I opened "Your Shop", but when my friends did, it said that "Your Shop" was disabled and they couldn't open theirs. I log in today to buy some of the skins I got the discount for and they weren't there, instead there was Black Belt {{champion:77}}, Slay belle {{champion:55}}, Tango {{champion:28}}, Cosmic Dusk {{champion:498}}, Slayer {{champion:222}}, and Arcade {{champion:92}}. I just wanted to know if I could get the discounts from the first time I opened the discord shop and since they are obviously "better" than black belt udyr and tango eve (LOL). However I will understand if Riot doesn't revert it because I have no idea how i could open "Your Shop" and my friends couldn't, and I don't know if this is a bug or just something that happens to many players.

https://gyazo.com/4ddb3cb4e43b8987a84abff272eeb094 This Link is a gyazo screenshot of messages to my friend because of how hyped I was, it doesn't show the first discounts that I got and it doesnt show the dates of when I sent that message but I took that screenshot to give you a perspective of how hyped I was of getting those skin discounts and to try to give a little bit of proof that I'm not lying.

Thank you for your time,

DieguPvP (TG Diegu)

replies.body: Those offers were reset after we brought the shop down to fix some issues. No worries though, we can still see the first offers you got and have absolutely no problems with honoring those. Hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and let us know which one you'd like.
